title: Hot Seat: The Grill
description: One player sits in the Hot Seat. The group passes the phone and asks them rapid-fire questions. Honesty is mandatory.

cards.content: Who in this room do you trust the least with a secret?
What is the most illegal thing you have ever done?
Rate your own physical attractiveness on a scale of 1-10.
If you had to date one person in this room, who would it be?
What is the pettiest reason you have broken up with someone?
Have you ever looked through a partner's phone without them knowing?
What is the grossest habit you have when you are alone?
If you could kill someone and get away with it, would you?
Who was your worst kiss ever?
What is the biggest lie you have told your parents?
Have you ever stalked an ex on social media using a fake account?
Who in this room has the worst fashion sense?
What is the most embarrassing thing in your search history right now?
Have you ever peed in a pool?
What is the biggest lie you ever told to get out of trouble?
If you had to trade lives with one person in this room, who would it be?
What is your most toxic trait?
Who is your favorite person in this room?
Have you ever stolen something? What was it?
How many people have you slept with?
Have you ever been fired from a job? Why?
What is the most expensive thing you have broken and hidden?
Who in this room is most likely to end up in jail?
Have you ever been in love with someone who didn't love you back?
What is your biggest insecurity?
If you had to delete one app from your phone forever, what would it be?
What is the meanest thing you have ever said to someone's face?
Have you ever hooked up with a coworker?
What is a rumor you spread that turned out to be false?
If you could erase one past relationship, which one would it be?
What is the longest you have gone without showering?
Who in this room makes you laugh the hardest?
Have you ever cheated on a test?
What is your biggest turn-off?
If you won the lottery, who in this room would you NOT give money to?
What is the most embarrassing photo of you that exists?
Have you ever ghosted someone you were dating?
What is one thing you pretend to like but actually hate?
Who in this room would you want with you on a deserted island?
What is the worst gift you have ever received?
Have you ever laughed at a funeral?
What is your guilty pleasure TV show?
If you could change your name, what would you change it to?
Have you ever sent a text to the wrong person about them?
What is the weirdest dream you have ever had?
If you had to marry the last person you texted, would you be happy?
What is your most useless talent?
Have you ever blamed a fart on someone else?
What is the most money you have ever lost?
Who was your first celebrity crush?
Have you ever used a fake ID?
What is the worst haircut you have ever had?
If you were an animal, what would you be?
Have you ever eaten food out of the trash?
What is one thing you are irrationally afraid of?
Have you ever been rejected publicly?
What is the worst advice you have ever given?
Who in this room do you think is the smartest?
Have you ever broken a bone doing something stupid?
What is the last thing you Googled?
Have you ever accidentally insulted someone?
What is one thing you would save from a fire?
Have you ever dropped your phone in the toilet?
What is the weirdest food combination you enjoy?
Have you ever snooped in someone's medicine cabinet?
What is the most cringe thing you posted on social media?
If you could be famous for one thing, what would it be?
Have you ever had a paranormal experience?
What is the worst date you have ever been on?
Who is the most dramatic person you know?
Have you ever lied about your age?
What is one habit you wish you could break?
Have you ever worn the same underwear two days in a row?
What is the most romantic thing someone has done for you?
Have you ever forgotten a close friend's birthday?
What is your biggest pet peeve?
If you could swap lives with anyone in this room, who would it be?
Have you ever dined and dashed?
What is a skill you lie about having?
Who in this room do you think will get married first?
If you were arrested, what would it be for?
Have you ever peed in the shower?
Do you pick your nose?
What is the longest you have gone without brushing your teeth?
Have you ever regifted a gift to the person who gave it to you?
What is the most trouble you got into at school?
Have you ever had a crush on a friend's parent?
What is the meanest rumor you've heard about yourself?
If you could punch one celebrity, who would it be?
Have you ever blocked a friend on social media?
What is your favorite smell?
Have you ever pretended to be sick to cancel plans?
If you had to eat one meal for the rest of your life, what would it be?
